ComicInfo.Summary:
A straightforward scientific mission becomes an entanglement of intrigue, as Dejah Thoris uncovers a Zodangan plot to destroy the Helium naval fleet. Can she identify the spy in their midst before it's too late?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Mike McKone | 1 | B | Cover B | Stephane Roux | 2 | C | Cover C | Sean Chen & Cris Peter | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Mike McKone | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Stephane Roux | 5 | F/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Sean Chen | 6 |
